name: The Coca-Cola Company
summary: The Coca-Cola Company is a multinational beverage corporation headquartered in Atlanta, United States, and is best known for its flagship product, Coca-Cola. Founded in 1892, it operates a global portfolio of more than 30 billion-dollar brands and is a leader in the non-alcoholic beverage industry. The company is publicly traded on the New York Stock Exchange and consistently ranks among the world’s largest corporations.
